Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 34th overall pick, by Cleveland in 1984...
Injured on 5/2/1984 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 8/11/1985 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 7 weeks...
Injured on 5/11/1986 with a Fractured Wrist, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 6/8/1986 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Had first career hit (triple) on 9/18/1988, off Mark Lemongello (CAL)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/18/1989, off Jeff D. Robinson (BAL)...
Had 21-game hitting streak snapped on 7/21/1989...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
Injured on 5/11/1991 with a Dislocated Shoulder, out for 4 weeks...
Was selected to the 1992 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Minnesota on 4/7/1993...
Injured on 5/30/1993 with a Inflamed Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Had 22-game hitting streak snapped on 9/6/1993...
Drove in 6 runs against Minnesota on 4/2/1995...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1995, hitting .654 with 4 HR, 12 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1995, hitting .451 with 9 HR, 27 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/5/1995, hitting .462 with 2 HR, 4 RBI...
Had 34-game hitting streak snapped on 5/11/1995...
Was selected to the 1995 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Detroit on 4/13/1996...
Was selected to the 1996 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 2/6/1998 to a 3-year deal worth $2,530,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/1998, hitting .444 with 3 HR, 10 RBI...
